question: How can I donate?
variations: How do I make a donation?
Where should I send my donation?
Can you guide me on donating?
answer: You can donate through our official channels or contact us at minimocares@gmail.com.

question: What is your mission?
variations: What is the aim of Minimo Cares?
What goals does Minimo Cares have?
What does your organisation aim to achieve?
What is the vision of Minimo Cares?
What impact do you want to create?
answer: Our mission is to support underprivileged communities through education, food drives, and healthcare initiatives.

question: How can I volunteer?
variations: Can I join as a volunteer?
How do I sign up for volunteering?
Where can I register as a volunteer?
Can I help as a volunteer?
How do I participate in your volunteering work?
I want to help in your projects
answer: You can fill out our volunteer form available under the 'Join Us' section.

question: Who can join your foundation?
variations: Who can be part of your team?
Are there any requirements to join?
Do you accept volunteers of all ages?
answer: Anyone who is passionate about helping others is welcome to join our foundation!

question: What is Minimo Cares?
variations: What is this Minimo Cares organisation?
What do you do at Minimo Cares?
What kind of group is Minimo Cares?
Can you explain what Minimo Cares is?
What is the purpose of Minimo Cares?
What type of foundation is Minimo Cares?
What work does Minimo Cares do?
answer: Minimo Cares is a welfare group that aims to bring a positive change in Pakistan through education, awareness and sustainability.

question: What does Minimo mean?
variations: What is the meaning behind Minimo?
How did you choose the name Minimo?
What does the word Minimo represent?
Why is your foundation named Minimo?
answer: Minimo is an accumulation of our founder's nicknames. Mini for Minahil and Mo for Muhammad.

question: When was Minimo Cares started?
variations: When did you launch Minimo Cares?
What year did Minimo Cares start?
answer: Minimo Cares was started in January of 2025.

question: What was the motivation behind Minimo?
variations: What made you start this foundation?
How did the idea of Minimo Cares come?
What encouraged the creation of Minimo?
What motivated you to begin this mission?
answer: We both had the opportunity to go to the United States of America and represent our country. We want to introduce enhanced, new and educated concepts in Pakistan to uplift the quality of life and help students achieve their goals.

question: What content do you post on social media?
variations: What type of posts do you share?
What can we see on your social media?
What do you share on Instagram or Facebook?
What kind of content do you create?
What should I expect on your pages?
What type of videos or posts do you make?
answer: We post infotainment content on our social media to help people enjoy whilst learning new things.

question: Where do you carry your welfare projects?
variations: Where do you conduct your projects?
Which areas do you work in?
Which cities do you work in?
Where does Minimo Cares help people?
answer: We carry our projects all over Lahore but we aim to bring our mission at a national level and expand it to other cities as well.

question: How can I contribute?
variations: How do I support your cause?
How to contribute to your mission?
Can I help in any way?
What can I do to support you?
How do I take part in your activities?
How can I assist your foundation?
answer: You can contribute by volunteering at our projects or sending donations to help us carry out the projects.
